article.title: BAE to Support Tactical Signals Intelligence
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems, Information and Electronic Systems Integration Incorporated, Nashua, New Hampshire, was awarded a $12 million firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-incentive-fee contract for the engineering and manufacturing services for the EMD Tactical Signals Intelligence Payload systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
